# The `HardwareLoops.cpp` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Insert hardware loop intrinsics into loops which are deemed profitable by the target, by querying <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Insert hardware loop intrinsics into loops which are deemed profitable by the target, by querying <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a>.

A hardware loop comprises of two intrinsics: one, outside the loop, to set the loop iteration count and another, in the exit block, to decrement the counter. The decremented value can either be carried through the loop via a phi or handled in some opaque way by the target.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return true if the search should stop, which will be when an inner loop is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// converted and the parent loop doesn&#39;t support containing a hardware loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> HardwareLoopsImpl::TryConvertLoop(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;L, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llvmcontext">LLVMContext</a> &amp;Ctx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Process nested loops first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AnyChanged = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42;SL : &#42;L)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AnyChanged |= TryConvertLoop(SL, Ctx);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AnyChanged) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-hardwareloops-cpp-/#aae269bc7f800ec24fb92133d830f4764">reportHWLoopFailure</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;nested hardware-loops not supported&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;HWLoopNested&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        ORE, L);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Stop search.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
